Uses of Interface
clipboard.GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener

  • Packages that use GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener 
    Package Description
    clipboard  
    command.elements  

    • Uses of GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener in clipboard

      Fields in clipboard with type parameters of type GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener> GraphicElementClipboardEntry.listeners
      List of currently registered listeners.
      private java.util.List<GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener> GraphicElementClipboardEntry.listenersToAdd
      As we cannot add listeners while iterating over them to fire an event, this keeps tabs on listeners added in other listeners' on* methods, so they can be added when the iteration is finished.
      private java.util.List<GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener> GraphicElementClipboardEntry.listenersToRemove
      As we cannot remove listeners while iterating over them to fire an event, this keeps tabs on listeners removed in other listeners' on* methods, so they can be removed when the iteration is finished.
      Methods in clipboard with parameters of type GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GraphicElementClipboardEntry.registerEntryListener(GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener listener)
      Registers a listener for this entry.
      void GraphicElementClipboardEntry.unregisterEntryListener(GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener listener)
      Unregisters a previously registered listener for this entry.

    • Uses of GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener in command.elements

      Classes in command.elements that implement GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GraphicElementCutCommand
      Command which cuts the current selection to the clipboard.
